name: Algolia InstantSearch Vue 最小
description: Vue 用 InstantSearch の最小

files.template:
<template><ais-instant-search :search-client="sc" index-name="books"><ais-search-box/><ais-hits/></ais-instant-search></template>

const sc = algoliasearch('app','key');
</script>
